{{cpp/title|isprint}}
{{cpp/string/byte/navbar}}
{{ddcl|header=cctype|
int isprint( int ch );
}}

Checks if {{c|ch}} is a printable character as classified by the currently installed C locale. In the default, {{c|"C"}} locale, the following characters are printable:

* digits ({{tt|0123456789}})
* uppercase letters ({{tt|ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ}})
* lowercase letters ({{tt|abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz}})
* punctuation characters ({{tt|1=!"#$%&amp;'()*+,-./:;&lt;=&gt;?@[\]^_`{&lt;!----&gt;{{!}}&lt;!----&gt;}~}})
* space ({{tt| }})

The behavior is undefined if the value of {{c|ch}} is not representable as {{c/core|unsigned char}} and is not equal to {{c|EOF}}.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|ch|character to classify}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
Non-zero value if the character can be printed, zero otherwise.

===Notes===
{{cpp/string/byte/note unsigned char}}

===Example===
{{example|
|code=
#include &lt;cctype&gt;
#include &lt;clocale&gt;
#include &lt;iostream&gt;
 
int main()
{
    unsigned char c = '\xa0'; // the non-breaking space in ISO-8859-1
 
    std::cout &lt;&lt; "isprint(\'\\xa0\', default C locale) returned "
              &lt;&lt; std::boolalpha &lt;&lt; (bool)std::isprint(c) &lt;&lt; '\n';
 
    std::setlocale(LC_ALL, "en_GB.iso88591");
    std::cout &lt;&lt; "isprint(\'\\xa0\', ISO-8859-1 locale) returned "
              &lt;&lt; std::boolalpha &lt;&lt; (bool)std::isprint(c) &lt;&lt; '\n';
}
|p=true
|output=
isprint('\xa0', default C locale) returned false
isprint('\xa0', ISO-8859-1 locale) returned true
}}
